required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anlotinib Plus Pemetrexed or Pemetrexed for Previously Untreated Elderly (>=70) or PS=2 Non-squamous NSCLC
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib Plus Pemetrexed as the 1-line Treatment of Patients With Platinum Intolerant Advanced Non-squamous NSCLC, With Pemetrexed Control.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluate the efficacy and safety of Anlotinib plus Pemetrexed as the 1-line treatment of patients with Platinum intolerant advanced non-squamous NSCLC, with Pemetrexed control.

detailed_description.textblock: Anlotinib (AL3818) is a kind of innovative medicines approved by State Food and Drug Administration（SFDA:2011L00661） which was researched by Jiangsu Chia-tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. Anlotinib is a kinase inhibitor of receptor tyrosine with multi-targets, especially for VEGFR1、VEGFR2、VEGFR3、FGFR1/2/3、PDGFRa/β c-Kit and MET.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients alive and progression free at 6 months (APF6)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Estimated to be from baseline up to 2 years
primary_outcome.description: the number (%) of patients who are alive and progression free per RECIST 1.1 at 6 months after randomization per Kaplan-Meier estimate of progression free survival at 6 months.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Estimated to be from baseline up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the time from randomization until the date of objective disease progression (RECIST 1.1) or death (by any cause in the absence of progression)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Estimated to be from baseline up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the time from randomization to death from any cause

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Estimated to be from baseline up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the total proportion of patients who demonstrate a response(complete responses + partial responses + stable disease ) to treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Estimated to be from baseline up to 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: the total proportion of patients who demonstrate a response(complete responses + partial responses) to treatment

intervention.description: Anlotinib p.o, qd and it should be continued until disease progress or unacceptable toxic effects. Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 every 21 days for 4-6 cycles or unacceptable toxic effects
Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 every 21 days for 4-6 cycles or unacceptable toxic effects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥70 years old and ECOG PS=0-2 or ≥18 years old and ECOG PS=2
- Diagnosed with advanced or recurrent non-squamous NSCLC (phase IIIB/IV) through pathology, with measurable nidus(using RECIST 1.1)
- No prior systemic treatment for non-squamous NSCLC
- Negative in EGFR&ALK&ROS1
- Main organs function is normal
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have any habitus or medical history of hemorrhage, however severe it is; the patients who have non healing wounds, ulcer or fracture after any events with hemorrhage or bleeding
- Symptoms of brain metastases cannot be controlled and treated within less than 21 days
- Have participated in other clinical trials of anti-tumor medicine within 4 weeks
- Get any severe diseases or the ones that cannot be controlled
